price: Dooniiwwan tolfaman kan akka gaarreenii galaana keessa yaa’an kan Isaati.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
